name: TiktaalikDreamings Realistic Weapon Pack
description:
Intended to add some vaguely more realistic weapons from history instead of the very fantasy cliche things in the game.  

A list of Items is here https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cTkd5ywF-1B9_VwyOHvri-QBNvMNvPp4/view?usp=sharing

Mod discord here https://discord.gg/XEUZxZRVF9
changeNote:
Rebalanced all weapon damage to better fit with vanilla conan.
Changed crafting ot sticks and clubs to hand crafted.  Some still require shaped wood though.
Fixed some issues with repairs on taiaha and vanir axe having things in the wrong columns, and probably being unrepairable.
Changed longswords to katana move set.
author: Tiktaalik Dreaming
